Factsheet

Daylight Basement Studio
Based in Greater Boston
Release date:

Windows and Linux
Website:
rbagame.com
Regular Price:
USD TBD

Description

Rightfully, Beary Arms is a bullet hell roguelite that is about more than collecting loot, dying, and then losing everything. Carefully choose enemy upgrades against your own. Plan your dungeon crawl tactfully to gun through unique factions of enemies and strategically preserve loot after death.

History

Features

  • Enemy and Player modifiers that change the world and systems
  • Emphasis on Planning dungeon routes and item collection
  • Active and Passive skill upgrades
  • Unique and fun weapons to collect
  • Weapon and ability persistence
  • Randomly generated ability trees
  • Randomly generated dungeons and worlds
  • 28 enemies and counting (as of alpha, lots more incoming)
